Package de.esoco.ewt.component

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChildView.IsChildViewWidget
    The interface to be implemented by child view widgets.
    ListControl.IsListControlWidget
    Contains the required methods for list widgets.
    ProgressBar.IsProgressBarWidget
    The interface of progress bar widgets
    TableControl.IsTableControlWidget
    The interface for table widgets.
    TextArea.IsTextArea
    An interface that describes the properties of text areas.
    TextControl.IsTextControlWidget
    The interface that needs to be provided by all text control widgets implementations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Button
    A button object that sends action events on selection.
    Button.ButtonWidgetFactory<W extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Focusable & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasText>
    The WidgetFactory for button widgets.
    Calendar
    A calendar component that allows to display and choose a date value.
    Calendar.CalendarWidgetFactory
    Widget factory for this component.
    CheckBox
    A button subclass that implements a selectable checkbox.
    CheckBox.CheckBoxWidgetFactory<W extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Focusable & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasHTML & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasValue<java.lang.Boolean>>
    Widget factory for this component.
    ChildView
    A view that is a child of the MainView.
    ChildView.ChildViewFactory
    Interface and implementation of a factory for the main panel of a child view.
    ComboBox
    A combo box component that has an editable text field and a popup menu with a list of values to choose from.
    ComboBox.ComboBoxWidgetFactory
    Widget factory for this component.
    Component
    This is the base class for all GEWT components.
    Composite
    Base class for components that are composed from a combination of other components.
    Container
    The base class for GEWT containers.
    Control
    Controls are components that can have the input focus and generate events from user interaction.
    DateField
    An input field that allows to input or select a date value.
    DateField.DateFieldWidgetFactory
    Widget factory for this component.
    DeckPanel
    A panel that can contain multiple components of which only one is visible at a time like the cards in a deck of cards.
    DeckPanel.AbstractDeckPanelLayout<T extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IndexedPanel & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets>
    The base class for GWT deck panel layouts.
    DeckPanel.DeckLayoutPanelLayout
    A deck layout implementation that is based on DeckLayoutPanel.
    DeckPanel.DeckPanelLayout
    A deck layout implementation that is based on DeckPanel.
    DialogView
    A child view subclass that represents dialogs.
    FileChooser
    A control that allows the user to select a file for server-side processing.
    FileChooser.FileChooserWidgetFactory
    Widget factory for this component.
    FixedLayoutPanel
    A base class for panels that have a fixed layout that cannot be changed after creation.
    FocusableComposite
    A composite that can receive the input focus.
    Label
    A GWT-specific EWT label implementation.
    Label.LabelWidgetFactory<W extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasText>
    Widget factory for this component.
    List
    A scrollable list of selectable elements.
    ListBox
    A combo box that combines a text field with a list of values.
    ListControl
    Base class for components that contain a list of strings.
    ListControl.GwtListBox
    A subclass of ListBox that implements the ListControl.IsListControlWidget interface.
    ListControl.ListControlWidgetFactory
    Widget factory for this component.
    MainView
    A GWT-specific main view implementation that wraps a root panel.
    MainView.MainViewLayout
    The default layout for the MainView of an application.
    Panel
    A panel that can contain arbitrary child widgets.
    ProgressBar
    A component that displays a horizontal or vertical bar representing an integer value.
    ProgressBar.ProgressBarWidgetFactory
    Widget factory for this component.
    RadioButton
    A radio button component that allows only one button in the same container to be selected at the same time.
    RadioButton.RadioButtonWidgetFactory
    Widget factory for this component.
    ScrollPanel
    A scroll panel that allows to scroll it's content.
    ScrollPanel.ScrollPanelLayout
    The default layout for this panel.
    SelectableButton
    The base class for buttons that can be selected like radio buttons, checkboxes, or toggle buttons.
    Spinner
    A component that allows to enter or modify integer values.
    Spinner.SpinnerWidgetFactory
    Widget factory for this component.
    SplitPanel
    A panel that contains two components that are separated by a draggable separator that allows to dynamically distribute the area available to the child components.
    SplitPanel.SplitPanelLayout
    The default layout for this panel.
    StackPanel
    A panel that can consist of multiple components that are arranged in a vertical stack.
    StackPanel.StackPanelLayout
    The default layout for this panel.
    SwitchPanel
    A base class for panels that switch between pages of components in some way like tabs or stacks.
    SwitchPanel.SwitchPanelLayout
    A base class for the default layouts of subclasses.
    Table
    A table component.
    TableControl
    Base class for GEWT table controls.
    TableControl.TableControlWidgetFactory
    Widget factory for subclasses.
    TabPanel
    A panel containing multiple components that are arranged in pages which can be displayed by clicking on a tab at the border of the tab panel.
    TabPanel.TabPanelLayout
    The default layout for this panel.
    TextArea
    A multiline text input component.
    TextArea.TextAreaWidgetFactory<W extends TextArea.IsTextArea>
    Widget factory for this component.
    TextControl
    A base class for components that handle text editing.
    TextField
    A text component subclass that allows single-line text input.
    TextField.TextFieldWidgetFactory<W extends TextControl.IsTextControlWidget>
    Widget factory for this component.
    ToggleButton
    A button component that can be toggled between two visual states.
    ToggleButton.ToggleButtonWidgetFactory<W extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Focusable & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasHTML & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasValue<java.lang.Boolean>>
    Widget factory for this component.
    Tree
    A tree component.
    Tree.TreeWidgetFactory
    Widget factory for this component.
    TreeTable
    A hierarchical table that allows it's rows to be expanded and collapsed like in a Tree.
    View
    The base class for all EWT views.
    Website
    A component that displays a website with a certain URL.
    Website.WebsiteWidgetFactory
    Widget factory for this component.
